metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17858 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the ensure_solid_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0 allows a remote attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file, because xref subsection object numbers are unrestricted.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17858` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-3
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-3').
